alert.note: Alert for Coosa; Elmore; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:26PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elmore, western Tallapoosa and eastern Coosa Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 626 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hatchet to Speed. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Goodwater, Rockford, Kellyton, Equality, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Hanover, Pentonville, Martin Dam, Bradford, Cottage Grove, Hatchet, Nixburg, Southern Lake Martin, Hillabee Creek, Speed, Eastern Lake Martin and Western Lake Martin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
